TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

span.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存工作階段權杖與工作階段，以及定義工作階段; 其他參數相關聯的使用者，例如工作階段的開始與結束時間。A session token stores the of the user that is associated with a session as well as other parameters that define the session; for example the session start and end times. 在被動的情況下，呼叫(SAM) 從要建立從工作階段權杖驗證管線，代表已驗證的使用者。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 會使用其設定才能建立語彙基元並將它序列化成 cookie （和還原序列化的後續要求的 cookie 語彙基元）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 會使用其設定的執行個體類別來寫入 HTTP 回應傳回的 cookie。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 此 cookie 則傳回給用戶端，並在後續要求 cookie，而不是反覆存取進行重新取得安全性權杖的身分識別提供者，可以呈現用戶端。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 如需有關如何使用 WIF 工作階段的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[WIF 工作階段管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). 在 Web 伺服陣列案例中使用工作階段的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 和 Web 伺服陣列](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 工作階段權杖可以在任一種參考模式下運作，或不。A session token can operate in either reference mode or not. 如果工作階段權杖不參考模式中運作，將整個語彙基元會序列化為儲存在用戶端的工作階段 cookie。If the session token is not operating in reference mode, the entire token is serialized into the session cookie that is stored on the client. 序列化的工作階段權杖可能很龐大，因此儲存在用戶端的 cookie 也可以是相當朝向。The serialized session token can be quite large and thus the cookie stored on the client can also be quite sizeable. 參考的模式，而不是序列化整個工作階段為 cookie 語彙基元，權杖會儲存在工作階段的安全性權杖快取，並只將用來產生金鑰從快取中擷取語彙基元所需的資訊儲存在 cookie 中。In reference mode, rather than serializing the entire session token into the cookie, the token is stored in a session security token cache and only the information used to generate the key necessary to retrieve the token from the cache is stored in the cookie. 這可以顯著降低的 cookie 大小。This can greatly reduce the size of the cookie. 工作階段權杖快取由衍生自的類別所實作和快取索引鍵由實作類別。The session token cache is implemented by a class derived from and the cache key is implemented by the class. 和屬性會用於類別來產生快取索引鍵。The and properties are used in the class to generate the cache key. 屬性會決定工作階段權杖是否參考模式中。The property determines whether the session token is in reference mode or not. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在參考模式運作，Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案，並在設定中的事件屬性對這個語彙基元傳入屬性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖仍會為每個要求的參考模式運作，並會優先使用前者只設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. WIF 所提供的類別序列化為 Ws-secure Conversation 工作階段權杖``項目。The class provided with WIF serializes the session token as a WS-Secure Conversation `` element.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified principal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`null`| ||設定為產生的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||| ||設定為產生的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| || 加上屬性。 plus the property.| ||`null`| ||包含產生 128 位元對稱金鑰。Contains a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 預設實作不會使用這個屬性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰依照所套用的 cookie 轉換，可處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||| || 加上屬性。 plus the property.|

-or- The property of is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId`| ||`endpointId`| ||設定為產生的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||設定的值為屬性由`ValidFrom`參數。Set to the value of the property as determined by the `ValidFrom` parameter.| ||值屬性由`ValidTo`參數。The value of the property as determined by the `ValidTo` parameter.| ||`null`| ||包含單一項目，即`key`或者，如果`key`是`null`，產生的 128 位元對稱金鑰。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 預設實作不會使用這個屬性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰依照所套用的 cookie 轉換，可處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||值`validFrom`參數，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， 。The value of the `validFrom` parameter, or, if `validFrom` is `null`, .| ||`validFrom` 參數的值。The value of the `validFrom` parameter. 如果`validFrom`是`null`，值屬性 (由`validFrom`參數) 再加上屬性。If `validFrom` is `null`, the value of the property (as determined by the `validFrom` parameter) plus the property.|

summary.span: Gets the session context identifier

span.span: Gets the session context identifier
The session context identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨所有工作階段權杖的內容識別項是唯一的。The context identifier is unique across all session tokens. 類別產生的語彙基元中的索引鍵使用的內容識別碼和金鑰產生。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 類別會序列化此屬性做為``子項目``項目。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndpointId As String
public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.

span.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.
The ID of the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性是`null`、 工作階段語彙基元會被視為全域範圍由類別。If the property is `null`, the session token is treated as globally scoped by the class. 這可能會造成潛在的安全性風險。This can present a potential security risk.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

value.span: 如果 cookie 是永久性;否則， 。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，cookie 會寫入成為永續性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the cookie is written as a persistent cookie. 在過期之前關閉瀏覽器後，持續性 cookies 維持有效。Persistent cookies remain valid after the browser is closed until they expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

value.span: 如果語彙基元工作階段模式中運作否則， 。

span.span: if the token is operating in session mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考模式，在序列化期間產生簡單的成品並將權杖內容權杖，權杖處理常式相關聯的快取中儲存。In reference mode, a simple artifact is produced during serialization and the token material is stored in the token cache that is associated with the token handler. 權杖快取是衍生自類別的執行個體。The token cache is an instance of a class that derives from . Web 伺服陣列案例中，權杖快取必須在伺服陣列中的所有節點之間運作。For Web Farm scenarios, the token cache must operate across all nodes in the farm. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在參考模式運作，Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案，並在設定中的事件屬性對這個語彙基元傳入屬性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖仍會為每個要求的參考模式運作，並會優先使用前者只設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

span.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

value.span: 此權杖中的索引鍵產生唯一識別碼。

span.span: The unique identifier for the key generation in this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性內是唯一的工作階段權杖。The property is unique within a session token. 當發出工作階段權杖時有只有一個內容識別碼，可透過存取屬性。When a session token is issued it has only a context ID, which is accessible through the property. 更新工作階段權杖後，會加入金鑰產生。When the session token is renewed, the key generation is added. 類別產生的語彙基元中的索引鍵使用的內容識別碼和金鑰產生。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 類別會序列化此屬性做為``子項目``項目。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

span.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

value.span: 識別用來序列化此語彙基元的 Ws-secure Conversation 版本 URI。

span.span: The URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別支援 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 和 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3。The base class supports WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 and WS-Secure Conversation 1.3. 為這些版本的 Ws-secure Conversation Uri 是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc"和"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512"分別。The URIs for these versions of WS-Secure Conversation are "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc" and "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512" respectively.

span.span: This is usually a single key.

span.span: The keys associated with the session.
There is usually a single key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 預設實作不使用這個屬性。The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰依照所套用的 cookie 轉換，可處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.
